com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.strategy

Class RandomStrategy<C extends Element>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.strategy.InterruptibleStrategy<C>
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.strategy.RandomStrategy<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - is the type of Elements to which the Strategy applies.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interruptible, Strategy<C>

    public class RandomStrategy<C extends Element>
extends InterruptibleStrategy<C>
    RandomStrategy extends Strategy, by providing a random Stepselection strategy.

      • getCandidates

        public java.util.Collection<C> getCandidates(java.util.Collection<C> elements,
                                             java.util.Collection<PodInstanceRequirement> dirtyAssets)
        Description copied from interface: Strategy
        Returns the candidate element(s), if any, which may have work performed against them.
        Parameters:
        elements - the elements to be examined for candidacy
        dirtyAssets - any asset names which already have work in progress elsewhere, which should not be returned by this call
        Returns:
        zero or more candidates for work to be performed
